channel.title: testing on Vishesh Handa's blog
channel.description: Recent content in testing on Vishesh Handa's blog

item.title: Better unit tests
item.description: A little while ago, before Akademy, I started implementing the Shared Hash Memory table, so as to improve Nepomuk’s architecture. Architectural designs really interest me. I decided to be smart about it, if I was going to refactor some of the main classes, there was a very high chance I would break something. The code is quite complex. I needed a way to make sure I was on the right track.
